headline: U.S. Bank Avvance partners with Magwitch to expand its point-of-sale lending offering to more customers
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, January 30, 2025--U.S. Bank Avvance, a real-time, point-of-sale lending solution, has been selected by Magwitch, a Jacksonville, Fla-based fintech, to provide Point-of-Sale Lending through merchants using Magwitch’s lending-as-a-service platform.
